creator: VIZOR APPS LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Explore an epic 📣 mix of original mahjong and exciting quests across the Magic Lands! 🔮

Mahjong Treasure Quest is not only about matching tiles.

For your unforgettable gaming experience we spiced it up with brain-teasing puzzles and fun riddles, exciting expeditions and challenging quests.

You'll never be alone: little Sophie and her loyal cat Oliver will lend color to your journey.

✨You're about to:✨

🔹Enjoy 3 000+ fascinating layouts;
🔸Solve captivating quests and puzzles;
🔹Clear your way from one land to another, getting rid of whimsical plants and building magic portals;
🔸Collect rare artefacts and gems;
🔹Restore and decorate your awe-inspiring family estate;
🔸Set free the enchanted cats;
🔹Have fun playing with your friends and family.

🌟More features you’ll treasure:🌟

🔥Regular game updates with new characters, levels, and quests;
🀄️Special bonus levels, timed quests, exclusive tile sets;
💬Amazing community and support;
✅Ability to play offline without losing your progress.

For your unforgettable gaming experience we spiced it up with brain-teasing puzzles and fun riddles, exciting expeditions and challenging quests.

You'll never be alone: little Sophie and her loyal cat Oliver will lend color to your journey.

✨You're about to:✨

🔹Enjoy 3 000+ fascinating layouts;
🔸Solve captivating quests and puzzles;
🔹Clear your way from one land to another, getting rid of whimsical plants and building magic portals;
🔸Collect rare artefacts and gems;
🔹Restore and decorate your awe-inspiring family estate;
🔸Set free the enchanted cats;
🔹Have fun playing with your friends and family.

🌟More features you’ll treasure:🌟

🔥Regular game updates with new characters, levels, and quests;
🀄️Special bonus levels, timed quests, exclusive tile sets;
💬Amazing community and support;
✅Ability to play offline without losing your progress.

title: Mahjong Treasure Quest

container.value: Office 301, Leoforos Archiepiskopou Makariou III, 169, 3027, Limassol, Cyprus

creator: VIZOR APPS LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Bored of classic mahjong games with no storyline? Keen on adventure games? Explore the world of fantasy mahjong matching tiles and help a little witch girl to rebuild & restore her parents’ mansion!

This puzzle game of mahjong (also known as real mah jongg, chinese mahjong, majong, mahjongg, maj, majhong, mah-jong, shanghai mah jong, hong kong mahjong or 麻将) is great choice not only for board games lovers, but for all the mystery solvers too. Become a real tile master, connect the layout and show the world your mahjong soul!

If you like such board games & card games like sudoku, jigsaw puzzles, dominos, ludo, tripeaks, tile connect, backgammon, taipei, word search, klondike, mahjong solitaire, merge and match 3D games, you’ll enjoy Mahjong Treasure Quest! Blast the tiles, splash them using different boosters and become a real legend! Start the exploration tour trying to find the lost parents, collect top artifacts and solve all puzzles on your way to glory!

Unravel the enigma and dip into a new mahjong journey rushing through the dream forest and solving many kinds of jigsaw puzzles and smart games! Travel around the globe to find the best treasure of this fairy mahjong - a little girl’s parents! Become the mahjong king or queen, do the tile match, and find the epic fairway in this free mahjong adventure game! If you want to become a match master, the fantasy becomes true - here’s your best adventure quest, have fun!

Our game is not only one of the brain training free puzzle games, but it also has these special city building features for all lovers of island games and lost civilization explorers. Got into trouble? Don’t worry! Just collect little suns made of gold playing mahjong classic game, and you’ll find the way out! Build the best city to welcome the lost parents of our little girl - she has been waiting for them for so long!

Our mahjong expedition can offer you:
- Thousands of mahjong layouts;
- Monthly adventure quest & journey;
- Restoration of huge Home Estate;
- Tons of amazing fairy games during the expedition.
descriptionShort: Match tiles of this mahjong game (麻将) & start your secret restore expedition!

title: Mahjong Treasure Quest

container.value: Office 301, Leoforos Archiepiskopou Makariou III, 169, 3027, Limassol, Cyprus

creator: VIZOR APPS LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Bored of classic mahjong games with no storyline? Keen on adventure games? Explore the world of fantasy mahjong matching tiles and help a little witch girl to rebuild & restore her parents’ mansion!

This puzzle game of mahjong (also known as real mah jongg, chinese mahjong, majong, mahjongg, maj, majhong, mah-jong, shanghai mah jong, hong kong mahjong or 麻将) is great choice not only for board games lovers, but for all the mystery solvers too. Become a real tile master, connect the layout and show the world your mahjong soul!

If you like such board games & card games like sudoku, jigsaw puzzles, dominos, ludo, tripeaks, tile connect, backgammon, taipei, word search, klondike, mahjong solitaire, merge and match 3D games, you’ll enjoy Mahjong Treasure Quest! Blast the tiles, splash them using different boosters and become a real legend! Start the exploration tour trying to find the lost parents, collect top artifacts and solve all puzzles on your way to glory!

Unravel the enigma and dip into a new mahjong journey rushing through the dream forest and solving many kinds of jigsaw puzzles and smart games! Travel around the globe to find the best treasure of this fairy mahjong - a little girl’s parents! Become the mahjong king or queen, do the tile match, and find the epic fairway in this free mahjong adventure game! If you want to become a match master, the fantasy becomes true - here’s your best adventure quest, have fun!

Our game is not only one of the brain training free puzzle games, but it also has these special city building features for all lovers of island games and lost civilization explorers. Got into trouble? Don’t worry! Just collect little suns made of gold playing mahjong classic game, and you’ll find the way out! Build the best city to welcome the lost parents of our little girl - she has been waiting for them for so long!

Our mahjong expedition can offer you:
- Thousands of mahjong layouts;
- Monthly adventure quest & journey;
- Restoration of huge Home Estate;
- Tons of amazing fairy games during the expedition.
descriptionShort: Match tiles of this mahjong game (麻将) & start your secret restore expedition!

title: Mahjong Treasure Quest

container.value: Office 301, Leoforos Archiepiskopou Makariou III, 169, 3027, Limassol, Cyprus

creator: VIZOR APPS LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Bored of classic mahjong games with no storyline? Keen on adventure games? Explore the world of fantasy mahjong matching tiles and help a little witch girl to rebuild & restore her parents’ mansion!

This puzzle game of mahjong (also known as real mah jongg, chinese mahjong, majong, mahjongg, maj, majhong, mah-jong, shanghai mah jong, hong kong mahjong or 麻将) is great choice not only for board games lovers, but for all the mystery solvers too. Become a real tile master, connect the layout and show the world your mahjong soul!

If you like such board games & card games like sudoku, jigsaw puzzles, dominos, ludo, tripeaks, tile connect, backgammon, taipei, word search, klondike, mahjong solitaire, merge and match 3D games, you’ll enjoy Mahjong Treasure Quest! Blast the tiles, splash them using different boosters and become a real legend! Start the exploration tour trying to find the lost parents, collect top artifacts and solve all puzzles on your way to glory!

Unravel the enigma and dip into a new mahjong journey rushing through the dream forest and solving many kinds of jigsaw puzzles and smart games! Travel around the globe to find the best treasure of this fairy mahjong - a little girl’s parents! Become the mahjong king or queen, do the tile match, and find the epic fairway in this free mahjong adventure game! If you want to become a match master, the fantasy becomes true - here’s your best adventure quest, have fun!

Our game is not only one of the brain training free puzzle games, but it also has these special city building features for all lovers of island games and lost civilization explorers. Got into trouble? Don’t worry! Just collect little suns made of gold playing mahjong classic game, and you’ll find the way out! Build the best city to welcome the lost parents of our little girl - she has been waiting for them for so long!

Our mahjong expedition can offer you:
- Thousands of mahjong layouts;
- Monthly adventure quest & journey;
- Restoration of huge Home Estate;
- Tons of amazing fairy games during the expedition.
descriptionShort: Match tiles of this mahjong game (麻将) & start your secret restore expedition!

Bored of classic mahjong games with no storyline? Keen on adventure games? Explore the world of fantasy mahjong matching tiles and help a little witch girl to rebuild & restore her parents’ mansion! Tile puzzle Games is Mahjong Treasure Quest for the whole family! The magical world of mahjong tiles opens its doors to you!

This tile puzzles & brainteasers game of mahjong (also known as real mah jongg, chinese mahjong, tile majong, mahjongg, maj, majhong, mah-jong, shanghai mah jong, hong kong mahjong or 麻将) is great choice not only for board games lovers, but for all the mystery solvers too. Become a real tile master, connect the layout and show the world your tile mahjong soul!

The main characters are the magical girl Sophie and her friend, the talking cat 🐈 Oliver. Together they travel through a magical land in search of adventure and help its inhabitants.

Our mahjong expedition can offer you:
- Over 7000 tile mahjong levels and layouts!
- About 100 different, exciting expeditions!
- Monthly adventure quests and journeys!
- Restoration of a huge estate!
- Lots of amazing fairy tale games during the expedition!
- Our game combines many subgenres and different types of gameplay: tile
mahjong, expedition, decoration, zen match levels, merge!
- The available tile mahjong options in our game are golden dice, timed levels, collect crystal levels, boosters and preboosters and much, much more!
- From interesting events:
Event "Picnic", "Fair of Miracles", "Cat on a Tree", "Pignats", "Magnolia" - the essence and secrets of which you have to learn!

If you like such board games & card tile games like sudoku, jigsaw puzzles & brainteasers, dominos, ludo, tripeaks, tile connect, backgammon, taipei, word search, klondike, mahjong solitaire, merge and match 3D games, you’ll enjoy Mahjong Treasure Quest! Blast the tiles, splash them using different boosters and become a real legend! Start the exploration tour trying to find the lost parents, collect top artifacts and solve all puzzles on your way to glory!

Unravel the enigma and dip into a new mahjong journey rushing through the dream forest and solving many kinds of jigsaw puzzles and smart games! Travel around the globe to find the best treasure of this fairy mahjong - a little girl’s parents! Become the mahjong king or queen, do the tile match, and find the epic fairway in this free mahjong adventure game! If you want to become a match master, the fantasy becomes true - here’s your best adventure quest, have fun!

Our game is not only one of the brain training free puzzle games, but it also has these special city building features for all lovers of island games and lost civilization explorers. Got into trouble? Don’t worry! Just collect little suns made of gold playing mahjong classic game, and you’ll find the way out! Build the best city to welcome the lost parents of our little girl - she has been waiting for them for so long! Our tile game is always with you! A huge, adventurous world in your mobile device!

creator: VIZOR APPS LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Non-standard and unique Mahjong Tile Game layouts will give you a lot of fun, relaxation and joy. Mobile app, Mahjong Treasure Quest Tile game is Tile Games full of adventure and travel! Bored of classic mahjong games with no storyline? Keen on adventure games? Explore the world of fantasy mahjong matching tiles and help a little witch girl to rebuild & restore her parents’ mansion! Tile puzzle Games is Mahjong Treasure Quest for the whole family! The magical world of mahjong tiles opens its doors to you!

This tile puzzles & brainteasers game of mahjong (also known as real mah jongg, chinese mahjong, tile majong, mahjongg, maj, majhong, mah-jong, shanghai mah jong, hong kong mahjong or 麻将) is great choice not only for board games lovers, but for all the mystery solvers too. Become a real tile master, connect the layout and show the world your tile mahjong soul!

The main characters are the magical girl Sophie and her friend, the talking cat 🐈 Oliver. Together they travel through a magical land in search of adventure and help its inhabitants.

Our mahjong expedition can offer you:
- Over 7000 tile mahjong levels and layouts!
- About 100 different, exciting expeditions!
- Monthly adventure quests and journeys!
- Restoration of a huge estate!
- Lots of amazing fairy tale games during the expedition!
- Our game combines many subgenres and different types of gameplay: tile
mahjong, expedition, decoration, zen match levels, merge!
- The available tile mahjong options in our game are golden dice, timed levels, collect crystal levels, boosters and preboosters and much, much more!
- From interesting events:
Event "Picnic", "Fair of Miracles", "Cat on a Tree", "Pignats", "Magnolia" - the essence and secrets of which you have to learn!

If you like such board games & card tile games like sudoku, jigsaw puzzles & brainteasers, dominos, ludo, tripeaks, tile connect, backgammon, taipei, word search, klondike, mahjong solitaire, merge and match 3D games, you’ll enjoy Mahjong Treasure Quest! Blast the tiles, splash them using different boosters and become a real legend! Start the exploration tour trying to find the lost parents, collect top artifacts and solve all puzzles on your way to glory!

Unravel the enigma and dip into a new mahjong journey rushing through the dream forest and solving many kinds of jigsaw puzzles and smart games! Travel around the globe to find the best treasure of this fairy mahjong - a little girl’s parents! Become the mahjong king or queen, do the tile match, and find the epic fairway in this free mahjong adventure game! If you want to become a match master, the fantasy becomes true - here’s your best adventure quest, have fun!

Our game is not only one of the brain training free puzzle games, but it also has these special city building features for all lovers of island games and lost civilization explorers. Got into trouble? Don’t worry! Just collect little suns made of gold playing mahjong classic game, and you’ll find the way out! Build the best city to welcome the lost parents of our little girl - she has been waiting for them for so long! Our tile game is always with you! A huge, adventurous world in your mobile device!
descriptionShort: Adventure Mahjong tile! Match tiles! Treasure Majong pyramid! Matching games!
